mapper.insert: insert into comment values (#{commentId}, #{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, NOW(), NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: select c.commentId, c.boardId, c.memberId, c.content, m.img from comment c, member m where commentId = #{commentId} and memberId in(select memberId from member where memberId=#{memberId})

select c.commentId, c.boardId, c.memberId, c.content, m.img from comment c, member m where boardId = #{boardId} and memberId in(select memberId from member where memberId=#{memberId}) order by insert_time DESC
select count(*) from comment where boardId = #{boardId}
